skins.shipDescription: Agano-class light cruiser number one C Agano.
skins.selfIntroduction: I am Agano, the lead ship of the Agano-class. My abilities as a light cruiser are first-rate, though my birth was just a tad bit late... Commander, it is a pleasure to be in your service.
skins.acquisition: Are you the Commander? My name is Agano. The pleasure is all mine, *giggle*... Never mind that, it was nothing. I'm eager to assume my position within your fleet.
skins.login: Commander, it's not yet time for work. Are you confident you didn't get the time wrong?
skins.details: Ah, if it isn't you, Commander. I was just making a snack. Could you taste it for pois... I mean, taste to see if it's done?
skins.secretaryIdle1: Commander, if you're tired, why not play a game of leapfrog and jump around in the office? It'll help improve your blood circulation~
skins.secretaryIdle2: Though supporting from behind the lines is easy, doing so for long periods makes me grow tired of it...
skins.secretaryIdle3: Commander, are you in need of some rest? Hm? *Giggle*, I just felt like asking. Stay focused and continue your work~
skins.secretaryTouch: These documents are for me... Hm? That's unusual? I like to keep business and pleasure separate, you see.

skins.shipDescription: Even though I'm not really into this whole "Christmas" thing, if it means I get to toy around with your heart by wearing this cute outfit of mine, then I suppose I would be interested. Hehe~
skins.acquisition: Even though I'm not really into this whole "Christmas" thing, if it means I get to toy around with your heart by wearing this cute outfit of mine, then I suppose I would be interested. Hehe~
skins.login: Oh, aren't you back early? May I suggest starting with a review of today's schedule?
skins.details: Is this a satisfactory pose for the occasion, Commander? Or would it suit you better if I stuck out my chest slightly more?
skins.secretaryIdle1: Commander, would you please stand over there for a moment? I need an accurate reference for the snow sculpture I'm making~
skins.secretaryIdle2: You've done well, Commander. Please get yourself some hard-earned sleep tonight. Ah, you thought I was teasing you with that request? *Giggle*~
skins.secretaryIdle3: Commander, what are you wishing for this Christmas? Ah, you don't need to consider your options at length. I picked out your present long ago, you see?
skins.secretaryTouch: *Giggle*, while I do enjoy a bit of teasing, being on good terms with you is more important. Commander, how about we set some time aside to watch the snowfall later?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Oh my, it appears my costume has caused an unintended development?

skins.shipDescription: "Oh my, you're also out for a stroll? Hehe, my name's Agano. And what might yours be?" ...Jeez, Commander, take this more seriously. According to the setting, we just met for the first time.
skins.acquisition: "Oh my, you're also out for a stroll? Hehe, my name's Agano. And what might yours be?" ...Jeez, Commander, take this more seriously. According to the setting, we just met for the first time.
skins.login: "Hey, are you here by yourself? Hehe. Why don't we... have a little chat, then?"
skins.details: This super-cute girl was sitting on a bench all by herself while looking a little lonely~ But too bad this scaredy-Commander won't even pounce on the opportunity~
skins.secretaryIdle1: You haven't had anything to eat? If you'd like, you can have some of my crepe~
skins.secretaryIdle2: "Um... do you mind if I shift a bit closer to you? It's a bit chilly out here..." What am I after? Jeez, way to spoil the mood...
skins.secretaryIdle3: "Would you mind telling me more about yourself? I feel like... we have a lot in common~" ...Hehe, in other words, I want to learn a lot more about you!
skins.secretaryTouch: "Want to take a stroll with me?" *sigh*... It took me five minutes just to get you to ask me out. Commander, you have to take the initiative next time, got it?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Manhandling a girl who you barely just met... Heeh~ Commander, I didn't know you were that kind of person~

skins.shipDescription: The blunt approach is not my style, but I cannot have Noshiro think I only inch my way to success... Oh, I was just talking to myself, Commander. Hehe, so anyway, would you mind being my partner for tonight's party?
